skills.intro: A Really long intro explaining in brief about your skills.

about.intro:
I am a full-stack developer and a freelancer. I have worked in the software development field for the last 5 years.
Besides the magic of being able to keep trying on and on until my code finally works, and keep coding for 24 hours to make an effort to develop something that will make the world a better place, I also provide help and support to newbies. While I help them with what I already know I also try and learn from them.
I love to explore the possibilities via experiments and push my limits bit by bit. I am always looking for new challenges to learn and grow myself.
Looking for an opportunity to secure a challenging and reputed position as a successful software developer at a well-known software company that offers a positive atmosphere to grow my knowledge and skills while implementing those for the betterment of the organization I work for.
about.testimonials-intro:
Testimonials are organic feedbacks that can draw a better picture of someone's character and also motivate the person on context to continue keeping up with those statements.
Testimonials I have received from Co-workers, Supervisors, Clients so on:

1.name: Ridip Khanal
1.company: Department of Computer Science and Application, Mechi Multiple Campus
1.said: I am pleased with his enthusiasm for accomplishing new and challenging tasks. He always demonstrated commitment to resolving issues among team members struggling with unique problems and situations. He is dependable and a great team member.
1.highlight: He is dependable and a great team member.

1.title: High School
1.description: High school, which is also called "Secondary education" in Nepal takes place in 2 stages: Grades 9 & 10. It follows a common academic curriculum leading to a "School leaving certificate".

2.title: Intermediate
2.description: The intermediate level of education in Nepal is referred to as Plus 2 (+2). It starts after the successful completion of ten years of schooling with passing grades. Plus 2 programs are available in streams like Science, Management, Humanities, and Education.

achievements.1: Took computer science and business mathematics as major.

education.intro: I started learning programming on my own.  I believe education accumulated from experience, failures, and outside of academics is equally important if not more. The following timeline shows my academic history and achievements.

1.title: Dot Net Developer
1.description: Crystal solution is a software company that provides web development services to various clients. Their flagship Product is Crystal ERP which is a complete ERP system for small and medium sized businesses.

achievements.1: Design and Development of Education Management Information System (EMIS).
achievements.2: Leading team of 5 members of the project as EMIS project leader.

2.title: Software Developer Intern
2.organization: Department of Computer Science and Application, Mechi Multiple Campus
2.description: Mechi Multiple Campus is a constituent campus of Tribhuvan University in Bhadrapur municipality of Jhapa district. Founded in 1964, it is the only constituent campus of Tribhuvan University in the district.
